price: 119 et n’auras à souffrir ni de la soif, ni de la chaleur du soleil. »
arabic: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظۡمَؤُاْ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضۡحَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-annaka lā taẓma-u fīhā walā taḍḥā
